text:
i-a
STAFF RECEIVING ONE MONTH*S VACATION
Persons holding the following positions are entitled to one month's
vacation:
President
Vice President
Assistant to the President
Chief Accountant
Editor, NAEB Journal
Director, Educational Television Stations
Director, National Educational Radio
Network Manager, National Educational Radio
Director, Instruction Division
Assistant Director, ITI Project
Director, Educational Communications System
6/22/66
